title: Lexibank: A publicly available repository of standardized lexical datasets with automatically computed phonological and lexical features for more than 2000 language varieties
description:

List, Johann-Mattis; Forkel, Robert; Greenhill, Simon J.; Rzymski, Christoph; Englisch, Johannes; and Russell D.
